comments:
I discovered this exception in the log. I cannot say precisely when it 
happened. This is why I set severity to minor.

It would appear that on a preference change, an AntEditor was notified of the 
change but did not have an AntModel. But this should not be possible with the 
code in AntEditor.antModelChanged(AntModelChangeEvent)?

Needs investigation.
I can reproduce the problem if the editor is closed during the callback.

Same underlying problem as bug 75665

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 75665 ***
